description.narrative:
Tunduma ( Tanzania)/Nakonde (Zambia) OSBP largely handles/ transit traffic from Dar Port to Zambia, Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC), Zimbabwe and Malawi. On average 300-400 trucks cross the border per day. One stop controls are being implemented albeit with some challenges which the project seeks to address.
Unlike Tunduma OSBP whose construction and IBM have just been completed with support from TMEA, Nakonde was funded by the Government of Zambia in 2014 but has serious infrastructure and OSBP facility deficiencies which hinder smooth OSBP operations. The project will cover needs assessment, Design and supervision of OSBP facility improvements ( office accommodation and clearance house and systems) and infrastructure (roads, parking yard, etc.) with a view to improving traffic flows, enhance efficiency and reduce cross border times thereby reducing trade costs.
